DOC.detailed_description: The assessment intervention carry researcher , physical therapy training expertise dermato-functional physiotherapy clinical experience 11 year , well fulfil prerequisite require management carboxytherapy , accord judgment 293 16 June 2012 Federal Council Physical Therapy Occupational Therapy ( COFFITO ) . Patients submit assessment intervention . Assessments contain demographic information participant ask question age , marital status , education contact , lifestyle , gynecological history , surgical history , anthropometric measurement physical inspection examination ( Annex 3 ) . Patients advise make use medication pain relief painkiller anti-inflammatory , within 4 hour physiotherapy session . For physical examination , evaluation conduct stand position , bath suit , keep gluteal region maximum visibility . The appraiser inspect bilateral gluteal region , confirm moderate degree severity gynoid lipodystrophy , define gynoid lipodystrophy severity scale , number skin depression ( ND ) moderate amount , ND≥ 5-9 depression , accord CSS classification . For study , three group divide : group A ( active TENS + active Carboxytherapy ) , Y group ( TENS placebo + active Carboxytherapy ) S ( active - control Carboxytherapy ) . Group A ( active TENS + active Carboxytherapy ) submit application TENS application Carboxytherapy , link . The Y group ( TENS placebo + active Carboxytherapy ) submit application Carboxytherapy TENS low-dose therapy . The group S ( active - control Carboxytherapy ) submit application Carboxytherapy TENS . Prior begin study , device calibrate . The gluteal receive intervention define lot . After draw group laterality gluteal region receive intervention , mark white pencil , depression skin cellulite delimitation area , follow line : lateral line midpoint great trochanter , vertical line draw iliac crest lateral edge gluteal groove ; top line draw horizontal line parallel gluteal groove , 4 cm posterior superior iliac spine vertical line drawn previously great trochanter bottom line draw horizontal line delimit gluteal groove ; medial end gluteal groove vertical line drawn previously great trochanter ; medial line delimit anatomically intergluteal slot .
